text: Ara misarera ye byakti take kinechila, se tara strike balala, ‘era thakara sam'manajanaka byabastha kara, sambhabata se amadera upakare asabe ba amara eke putrarupe'o grahana karate pari [1].‘Ara ebhabe'i amara i'usuphake se dese pratisthita karalama [2]; ebam yate amara take sbapnera byakhya siksa de'i [3]. Ara allah‌ tamra kaja sampadane apratihata; kintu adhikansa manusa jane na
